title: Can I buy a sheep with some defects for Qurbani / Udhiya? #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: Asam Alum Suppose there is a sheep which looks beautiful but it has cracks in its horn it has wound mark on its body which has healed but has scars it has one tooth broken and sled ears can I buy it for sacrifice also please specify what should I what should we look you are you're entitled for one question only the answer is these defects that you've mentioned are not something that renders your sacrifice invalid and hence yes you can buy it for uh qubani but it is not the best you should look for something better but if you do it is fine and valid inshallah
